job_tasks.phrase: Designing and developing key front-end components of our products.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of building software components, which falls under traditional software development.
Code review is a standard software development practice aimed at ensuring code quality and integration.
This involves contributing to the documentation of software, a common task in software development teams.
Supporting testing efforts is a typical part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Working closely with the interaction designers.
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with designers is a standard practice in front-end development to ensure the UI meets design specifications.
Integrating with APIs, specifically OpenAPI, is a software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: creating a blueprint for the future
job_tasks.justification: This refers to architectural design and planning within a software development context.

soft_skills.justification: Reviewing peer work implies collaboration and communication within the team.
Providing input requires communication with other roles.
Assisting testers involves communication and collaboration with the QA team.

soft_skills.phrase: Working closely with the interaction designers.
Understanding the end user's needs, have an eye for design and can implement UI functionality that is visually pleasing.
soft_skills.justification: This describes understanding user needs and applying design principles to create functional and aesthetically pleasing UI, which involves problem-solving and a pragmatic approach to design implementation.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on front-end development tasks, including designing and developing UI components, integrating with APIs (OpenAPI), and collaborating with designers and testers. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. The technologies listed (React, Redux, ReactQuery) are standard front-end development tools. Therefore, the role fits the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing entirely on front-end development without any mention of AI or ML. The tasks and technologies are unambiguous and directly map to the 'Software Engineer' profile.
